summary: The film tells a story of Mariana, a nurse who leaves Lisbon to accompany an immigrant worker in a comatose sleep on his trip home to Cape Verde. The devoted Portuguese nurse took a journey only to find herself lost in abstract drama.
cast: Inês de Medeiros|Isaach De Bankolé|Edith Scob|Pedro Hestnes|Cristiano Andrade Alves|António Andrade|Daniel Andrade|Manuel Andrade|Raul Andrade|Joaquim Antunes|Monica Calle|Joaquim Carvalho|Luís Miguel Cintra|Isabel de Castro|João Gomes de Pina|Sandra do Canto Brandão|António S. Lopes|João Medina|Clotilde Montron|Alina Montrond|Sidónio Pais|João Gomes Pina|Amália Tavares|Maria Hernâni
title: Casa de Lava
